<?php
/**
 * Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
 * the standard input according to the problem statement.
 **/

fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $p);
$c = str_split(stream_get_line(STDIN, 200 + 1, "\n"));

while($p >= 0) {

    $e=$p%count($c);
    echo $c[$e];
    $p=floor(($p-count($c))/count($c));

}
